amendment.description: Amendment prevented the expansion of the Equal Pay Act from including job applicants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 110-807 to strike Section 3(b), "Application of Provisions," from the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bean amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Bean.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bean amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
